channel.title: HELP, torva price problem
channel.description:
hey rune-server,
i would like to post a problem which i was facing for while, the problem is the torva
when i try and set it on a shop with changed price and when i compile and run, i go to the shop and click at the torva to check the price of it, and what it does is it says unarmed with the price of 1 coin, i edited the price etc, but still facing it, if someone could post a problem fix for this i would be very thankful, and oh yeah, its not just for the torva, some items also does the same, and im using gravityscape based source and client
